issue.title: [C++][Python][FileSystem] Make directory paths returned uniform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16270](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16270). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Depending on if paths are selected with recursion or without code the result of the returned directories changes to include a slash or not include a slash (see code linked below).  It would be nice to provide consistent output here.  It isn't clear i the breaking change is worthwhile here.

 

 [1] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3eaa7dd0e8b3dabc5438203331f05e3e6c011e37/python/pyarrow/tests/test_fs.py#L688

  [2] https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/3eaa7dd0e8b3dabc5438203331f05e3e6c011e37/cpp/src/arrow/filesystem/test_util.cc#L767
